questions.text: The rise of remote work has transformed how many people approach their careers. questions.text: Artificial intelligence is transforming healthcare in ways that seemed like science fiction just a decade ago. Machine learning algorithms can now detect certain cancers in medical images with accuracy that rivals experienced doctors. However, experts emphasize that AI should augment rather than replace human medical professionals, who bring irreplaceable qualities like empathy and holistic patient care.
